import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Container, Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import axios from 'axios' import { useNavigate, Link } from 'react-router-dom' import NavigationBar from '../NavigationBar/NavigationBar' import Footer from '../Footer/Footer' import './Register.css' const Register = () => { const [newUser, setNewUser] = useState({ username: '', email: '', password: '' }) const navigate = useNavigate() const handleChange = (e) => { setNewUser({ ...newUser, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() try { await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/api/users/register', newUser) navigate('/login') } catch (error) { console.error('Registration error:', error) // Handle error without showing an alert } } return (
Username Email Password
Already have an account? Login
) } export default Register
